alert.note: Alert for Stearns; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 1:55PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Wright, south central Benton, northwestern Sherburne and southeastern Stearns Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 154 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sauk Rapids to 7 miles northwest of Paynesville. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Sauk Rapids around 200 PM CDT. St. Cloud around 205 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Richmond, Cold Spring, Rockville, Watkins, Kimball and Clearwater. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 152 and 182. U.S. Highway 10 in Minnesota between mile markers 170 and 192. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
